features: Auxiliary Fill Light - Helloleiboo hand mirror built-in 20 LED light beads, handle button pressed 2 times in succession to give you open a full range of surround effects.
Sturdy & Fall Resistant - Portable makeup mirror shell using high-density ABS material, can protect the mirror does not break, use more at ease.
USB Charging - Mini travel mirror with a USB / Type-C charging cable, charging time 2 ~ 3 hours, fully charged state can be used for about a week.
Small & Lightweight - 9.1 * 4.7 inches handheld mirror size will not be large nor small, to meet the daily use, convenient storage does not take up space.
Satisfactory After Sales Service - If you have any questions about our hand mirror, please feel free to contact us, we promise to reply you within 24 hours.
body.description: Note: Indicates The State Of Charge By The Color Of The Button While Charging (Red - Charging. Green - Fully Charged)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift. She loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy and Illuminating
reviews.reviewText: I needed a mirror to toss in my travel bag that offered bright lighting so I could do my makeup well (hotels have awful lighting).Good:This mirror has become an indispensable companion in my travel and beauty routine. The LED lights are a game-changer, providing a bright and natural look that makes makeup application a breeze, especially in low-light conditions. The dimmable feature is a nice touch, allowing me to adjust the brightness to suit different environments. The USB charging capability is convenient, eliminating the need for batteries and ensuring the mirror is always ready to go.Bad:While the LED lights are fantastic, I found that the mirror could be a bit heavier than expected, making it less ideal for extended periods of use. Additionally, the dimmable function, while useful, sometimes requires a few tries to get the right level of brightness, as the touch-sensitive controls can be a bit sensitive.Overall Impression:This Handheld Makeup Mirror is a handy tool for on-the-go beauty enthusiasts. The LED lighting and dimmable features make it versatile for various lighting conditions, and the USB charging capability is a practical and eco-friendly touch. Despite a slightly heavier build and touch-sensitive controls that may take some getting used to, the mirror's functionality and portability make it a valuable addition to any makeup routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect travel mirror, that can also be used daily at home. It charges by USB, so no batteries are ever needed. My daughter uses this mirror for both checking the back of her hair and applying more even makeup. The dimmable light feature allows her to turn the lights up and down, in order to check for makeup lines. And, the handheld size is convenient for her when she wants to use its reflection against another mirror to check the back of her hair. She takes the mirror with her to hotels, on sleepovers and uses it daily when she's getting ready for school or work. This is a great gift, both for teenage girls, professional women and women who travel. The lighting options make it so much better than the old handheld mirrors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fit in the perfect spot in my camper and held all my makeup and skincare. Easy to clean if anything spills. Bright light on the mirror. I wish it had a little latch or something to make sure the lid stays on, but other than that, it’s great

I PUT A SUCTION ON THE BACK SO I CAN MOUNT TO THE LARGER MIRROR IN MY BATHROOM. I'M HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT AND IT SERVES ITS PURPOSE. I LIKE TO BE ABLE TO MOVE IT AROUND WHEREVER NEEDED.
